about_the_game:
DAYDREAM THE DREAMCORE HORROR
A surreal horror experience where reality bends, and your choices shape your escape.

  • Dreamcore aesthetic 
    Step into a world that blurs the line between dreams and reality, filled with nostalgic spaces, haunting visuals, and unsettling beauty.

  • Hyper-Realistic Immersion
    Designed to pull you in, the realistic graphics and minimal interface create an atmosphere so vivid, it feels like you’ve fallen into another world.

  • Explore Multiple Realms
    Traverse through a collection of visually captivating and surreal environments, each with its own mysteries, puzzles, and hidden dangers.

  • Whimsy Meets Nightmare
    Enter a realm where the bizarre and the beautiful collide. Each step feels like walking through a vivid daydream until it becomes a nightmare.

  • Avoid Hostile Entities
    Face terrifying creatures, each with unique mechanics you must uncover to survive. Be cautious and clever if you hope to outwit the lurking dangers.

  • Immersive Puzzle-Solving
    Every realm presents challenges that test your wits and perception. Pay attention your choices and actions will determine your fate.

  • Atmospheric Soundscapes
    Let the eerie ambience and immersive sound design heighten your tension as you navigate the dreamlike worlds.

Will you uncover the way out of this surreal liminal nightmare, or will you lose yourself in its depths?

short_description: DayDream is a first person horror exploration game where the line between dreams and reality blurs. Wander through deep nostalgic and visually pleasing liminal spaces, solving puzzles and uncovering mysteries while evading relentless entities. What does it mean to daydream for you?
